text: you know, she's why i first got into magic. i would do little shows for her, hang up a bedsheet like it was a curtain, put on a top hat and cape. and part way through the act, i would say i needed a volunteer from the audience to be my beautiful assistant and invite her up on stage. i can still remember the way she'd smile. for a few minutes, she'd forget how lonely she was.
